instructions: put the dinner  fork prong pointed upward on the left side
put the dinner knife with the blade facing the left on the right side
put the salad fork with the prong pointed upwards on the left side of the dinner fork
put the salad knife with the blade facing the left next to the right side of the dinner knife
put the soup spoon with its bowl upwards to the right side of the salad knife
put the dessert spoon horizontally with its bowl facing the left on the top
move the dessert spoon , put it vertically to the right side of the other dessert spoon
put the dessert spoon that on the far right side horizontally to the top, with its bowl pointing lef
put the dinner plate in the center
put the bread plate on the left top corner
put the butter knife on top of the bread plate, with it's blade pointed to the south-west direction
put the wine glass on the top right corner
put the  water glass on the top, to the top left side of the wine glass
place the napkin on  top of the dinner plate, vertically
